publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3417 Cathie Craigie: Muscular Dystrophy “My Life” Campaign—That the Parliament supports the 3,000 people in Scotland with inherited neuromuscular disorders and muscular dystrophy; supports the work of the Muscular Dystrophy Campaign in pioneering the search for treatments and cures for over 40 years, whilst also providing practical, professional and emotional support for people affected by neuromuscular conditions; supports the Muscular Dystrophy “My Life” campaign and its work in Scotland to encourage a co-ordinated approach by local authorities and NHS boards when assessing individuals’ needs and requirements, and considers the findings of the My Life expert group to be a model for future delivery of services to people affected by neuromuscular conditions.
S2M-3417 Muscular Dystrophy “My Life” Campaign (lodged on 14 October 2005) Mr Bruce McFee*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-3417 Muscular Dystrophy “My Life” Campaign (lodged on 14 October 2005) Donald Gorrie*
